subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Coach Mark Fox will lead Nevada into Saturday’s Bracket Buster game against Northern Iowa. It is a chance for them to prove to the N.C.A.A. selection committee that they are worthy of a high seeding.
snippet: Coach Mark Fox will lead Nevada into Saturday’s Bracket Buster game against Northern Iowa. It is a chance for them to prove to the N.C.A.A. selection committee that they are worthy of a high seeding.
